attacks.name: spectral hand
attacks.damage: {@damage 4d10+16} force plus dimensional shunt and drain life

mid.trigger: A creature within 60 feet uses a {@trait teleportation} effect
entries: The aiudara wraith teleports with the creature, arriving in an empty space of its choice adjacent to the triggering creature's destination. If the triggering effect targets multiple creatures, the aiudara wraith chooses which creature it arrives beside.
mid.name: Teleportation Attachment

entries: The aiudara wraith's touch displaces creatures and flings them through space. The creature must attempt a {@dc 40} Fortitude save.

entries.Critical Success: The creature is unaffected and becomes temporarily immune to dimensional shunt for 1 minute.
entries.Success: The creature is pushed 5 feet in a random direction.
entries.Failure: The creature is teleported 20 feet in a direction of the aiudara wraith's choice.
entries.Critical Failure: As failure, but the creature is also {@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 2}.

bot.name: Dimensional Shunt

entries: When an aiudara wraith damages a living creature with its spectral hand {@action Strike}, the aiudara wraith gains 18 temporary Hit Points and the target must succeed at a {@dc 40} Fortitude save or become {@condition drained|CRB|drained 1} and {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 1} as long as it is {@condition drained}. Further damage dealt by the aiudara wraith's spectral hand {@action Strike||Strikes} increases the value of the {@condition drained} and {@condition stupefied} conditions by 1 each on a failed save, to a maximum of 10 for both.
bot.name: Drain Life

entries: An aiudara wraith moves by means of localized teleportation. An aiudara wraith's {@action Stride} does not have the {@trait move} trait. When an aiudara wraith {@action Stride||Strides}, it reaches its destination within the range of its Speed immediately.
bot.name: Instantaneous Movement

resistances.name: all damage
resistances.note: except force, {@item ghost touch}, or positive; double resistance vs. non-magical

entries: The animated dragonstorm can be targeted by {@spell disjunction} and {@spell dispel magic}. If targeted by such a spell of 9th level or higher, the construct loses its resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and physical damage and is {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
mid.name: Vulnerable to Dispelling

entries: The animated dragonstorm directs a 30-foot cone of dragonstorm energy. This deals {@damage 3d8} acid, {@damage 3d8} cold, {@damage 3d8} electricity, {@damage 3d8} fire, and {@damage 3d8} poison damage to creatures in the cone ({@dc 40} basic Reflex save). The animated dragonstorm can't use Channel Dragonstorm again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Channel Dragonstorm

entries: The animated dragonstorm's attacks ignore the Hardness of objects with Hardness 20 or less.
bot.name: Destructive Strikes

entries: On a critical hit, the animated dragonstorm's fist bursts with dragonstorm energy.
The target takes {@damage 1d6} acid, {@damage 1d6} cold, {@damage 1d6} electricity, {@damage 1d6} fire, and {@damage 1d6} poison damage.
bot.name: Dragonstorm Strike

entries: Candlaron's echo rejuvenates so long as {@deity Dahak|LOGM}'s manifestation lives.
mid.name: Rejuvenation

entries: {@damage 12d6} bludgeoning, {@dc 44}
bot.name: Telekinetic Assault

resistances.name: all damage
resistances.note: except force, {@item ghost touch}, or positive; double resistance vs. non-magical

entries: 90 feet, {@dc 42}
mid.name: Frightful Presence

mid.trigger: The dragonshard guardian takes cold, fire, electricity, or sonic damage from a non–dragonshard guardian source
entries: The dragonshard guardian's body absorbs the energy entirely, preventing the damage from harming the construct. Its body reverberates and transforms the absorbed energy before projecting it outward in a 60-foot burst. Each creature within the burst takes an amount of fire damage equal to the amount of energy damage absorbed by the triggering attack, including any damage resisted by the guardian's resistances and additional damage from its weakness ({@dc 45} basic Reflex save). This fire damage doesn't harm objects or constructs.
mid.name: Reverberating Revenge

entries: The construct breathes in one of two ways, then can't use Breath Weapon again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.

items.name: Flame
entries: A blast of flame deals {@damage 15d10} fire damage to all creatures in a 60-foot cone ({@dc 45} basic Reflex save). This fire damage does not harm objects or constructs.

items.name: Weakening Gas
entries: A cloud of gold-flecked gas forces each creature in a 60-foot cone to attempt a {@dc 45} Fortitude save; the effect lasts 1 minute.

bot.name: Breath Weapon

entries: The dragonstorm fire giant raises one hand to the sky, channeling dragonstorm energy into the blade held in the other. The giant makes a greatsword {@action Strike} with a –2 circumstance penalty against each creature within its reach. It makes only one attack roll and compares the result against each creature's AC. This {@action Strike} deals an additional {@damage 1d8} acid, {@damage 1d8} cold, {@damage 1d8} electricity, {@damage 1d8} fire, and {@damage 1d8} poison damage and counts as two attacks for the giant's multiple attack penalty.
bot.name: Dragonstorm Blade

spells.name: dimension door
notes: this spell has been cast already

spells.name: contingency
notes: this spell has been cast already

spells.name: mage armor
notes: this spell has been cast already

entries: A 5th-level {@spell dimension door} spell is cast on Emaliza; she uses this to escape an attack that she fears would incapacitate or kill her.
mid.name: Contingency

bot.requirements: Emaliza hasn't acted yet on this turn
entries: Emaliza can cast one prepared spell she has already cast today without spending a spell slot. She must still {@action Cast a Spell||Cast the Spell} and meet the spell's other requirements.
bot.name: Drain Bonded Item

entries: Emaliza's magic creates a small defensive aura around her. She gains 20 temporary Hit Points and resistance 20 to either acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage. The defensive aura remains until the beginning of her next turn.
bot.name: Warded Casting

entries: {@damage 4d8+10} bludgeoning, {@dc 41}
bot.name: Constrict

entries: The mutant's various hands stretch and reach out in an attempt to grab nearby creatures. The mutant attempts an {@skill Athletics} check to {@action Grapple} all creatures within 10 feet. The mutant's multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until it has made all the {@skill Athletics} checks that are part of its Grasping Hands. Creatures that are {@condition grabbed} are pulled to a space adjacent to the mutant. This is forced movement.
bot.name: Grasping Hands

bot.requirements: Ilgreth hasn't acted yet on this turn
entries: Ilgreth can cast one prepared spell he has already cast today without spending a spell slot. He must still {@action Cast a Spell||Cast the Spell} and meet the spell's other requirements.
bot.name: Drain Bonded Item

entries: If Ilgreth's next action is to {@action Cast a Spell}, the spell ignores 20 resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage.
bot.name: Overwhelming Energy

creature.name: Ingnovim Tluss
items: formula book (contains formulas for all common alchemical items of 19th level or lower)

entries: Ingnovim carries 4 {@item major acid flask||major acid flasks}, 4 {@item major alchemist's fire}, 2 {@item major bestial mutagen||infused major bestial mutagens}, 4 {@item major bottled lightning||major bottled lightnings}, 4 {@item major frost vial||major frost vials}, 2 {@item major juggernaut mutagen||infused major juggernaut mutagens}, and 4 {@item true elixir of life||true elixirs of life}. These items last for 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations.
top.name: Infused Items

bot.trigger: Ingnovim damages a creature with a syringe {@action Strike}
entries: The creature injected with unstable mutagen must attempt a {@dc 41} Fortitude save to resist the injection.

entries.Failure: The target's body shifts and mutates, growing difficult to control; the target is {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 2} and {@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 2} for 24 hours.
entries.Critical Failure: The target's body completely distorts into a shuddering blob of warped flesh that is incapable of action; the target is {@condition paralyzed}. Every 24 hours, the target may attempt a new saving throw against this effect; on a critical success, the paralysis ends.

bot.name: Inject Unstable Mutagen

entries: Ingnovim's body has adapted to the constant use of his mutagens. He does not suffer the drawback of any bestial mutagens but is still affected normally by other mutagens.
bot.name: Mutagenic Adaptation

entries: Ingnovim draws an alchemical bomb with an {@action Interact} action and throws it as a ranged {@action Strike}.
bot.name: Quick Bomber

entries: When one of Ingnovim's assistants dies, it bursts open in a foul-sounding and smelling explosion of toxic viscera and poisonous vapors.
All creatures within a 20-foot burst must attempt a {@dc 38} Fortitude save to resist this blast of poison.

entries.Critical Failure: The creature takes {@damage 14d8} poison damage and {@damage 2d8} {@condition persistent damage||persistent poison damage}.

mid.name: Death Throes

entries: Inizra gains a reaction at the start of each enemy's turn that she can use only during that turn.
mid.name: Boundless Reprisals

entries: Inizra always has her shield raised as if she had used the {@action Raise a Shield} action, as long as she meets that action's requirements.
mid.name: Paragon's Guard Stance

entries: Inizra can use {@action Attack of Opportunity} when a creature within her reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to its normal trigger.
She can disrupt triggering concentrate actions, and she disrupts actions on any hit, not just a critical hit.
mid.name: Attack of Opportunity

entries: Inizra is permanently {@condition quickened|CRB|quickened 1}. She can use her extra action only to {@action Strike}.
bot.name: Weapon Supremacy

entries: Smoke doesn't impair a red dragon's vision; it ignores the {@condition concealed} condition from smoke.
top.name: Smoke Vision

entries: 10 feet, {@damage 6d6} fire damage ({@dc 42} basic Reflex save)
mid.name: Dragon Heat

entries: 90 feet, {@dc 42}
mid.name: Frightful Presence

entries: Jaws only.
mid.name: Attack of Opportunity

mid.trigger: A creature within 100 feet casts an acid, cold, fire, electricity, or poison spell, or such a spell otherwise comes into effect from a source within 100 feet
entries: The manifestation makes all the choices to determine the targets, destination, or other effects of the spell, as though it were the caster.
mid.name: Redirect Energy

entries: {@deity Dahak|LOGM}'s manifestation breathes a blast of dragonstorm energy that deals {@damage 5d6} acid, {@damage 5d6} cold, {@damage 5d6} electricity, {@damage 5d6} fire, and {@damage 5d6} poison damage in a 60-foot cone ({@dc 46} basic Reflex save). It can't use Breath Weapon again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Breath Weapon

entries: The dragon makes two claw {@action Strike||Strikes} and one wing {@action Strike} in any order.
bot.name: Draconic Frenzy

entries: The dragon recharges its Breath Weapon whenever it scores a critical hit with a {@action Strike}.
bot.name: Draconic Momentum

entries: The manifestation attempts to take control of a magical acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison spell within 100 feet. If it succeeds at a counteract check (counteract level 10, counteract modifier +36), the original caster loses control of the spell, control is transferred to the manifestation, and the manifestation counts as having {@action Sustained a Spell||Sustained the Spell} with this action (if applicable). The manifestation can end the spell instead of taking control, if it chooses.
bot.name: Manipulate Energy

abilities: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

attacks.name: jaws
attacks.damage: {@damage 5d10+10} piercing plus {@damage 4d6} fire and {@ability Improved Grab}

entries: Smoke doesn't impair a red dragon's vision; it ignores the {@condition concealed} condition from smoke.
top.name: Smoke Vision

entries: 10 feet, {@dice 10d6} damage split evenly between acid, cold electricity, fire, and poison ({@dc 45} basic Reflex save)
mid.name: Dragonstorm Aura

entries: 120 feet, {@dc 45}
mid.name: Frightful Presence

entries: {@deity Dahak|LOGM}'s manifestation can't physically exit the Adamantine Fen until conditions are right, as described in Dahak Escapes on page 65. Planar travel effects do not allow it to escape, nor can they banish it from the Adamantine Fen.
mid.name: Imprisoned

entries: Jaws only.
mid.name: Attack of Opportunity

mid.trigger: A creature within 100 feet casts an acid, cold, fire, electricity, or poison spell, or such a spell otherwise comes into effect from a source within 100 feet.
entries: The manifestation of {@deity Dahak|LOGM} makes all the choices to determine the targets, destination, or other effects of the spell, as though it were the caster.
mid.name: Redirect Energy

entries: {@dice 2d10+10} plus {@damage 2d6} fire
bot.name: Constrict

entries: The dragon makes two claw {@action Strike||Strikes} and one wing {@action Strike} in any order.
bot.name: Draconic Frenzy

entries: The dragon recharges its Breath Weapon whenever it scores a critical hit with a {@action Strike}.
bot.name: Draconic Momentum

entries: The manifestation of {@deity Dahak|LOGM} breathes a blast of dragonstorm energy that deals {@damage 5d6} acid, {@damage 5d6} cold, {@damage 5d6} electricity, {@damage 5d6} fire, and {@damage 5d6} poison damage in a 60-foot cone ({@dc 48} basic Reflex save). It can't use Dragonstorm Breath again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Dragonstorm Breath

entries: The manifestation of {@deity Dahak|LOGM} breathes a blast of energy that deals {@dice 12d12} damage in a 90-foot line ({@dc 44} basic Reflex save). The type of damage this Breath Weapon deals can be acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison, as chosen by the manifestation when it attacks. The manifestation can't use its focused Breath Weapon again for 2 rounds, and the next time it uses its Breath Weapon, it must deal a different type of damage than the previous usage.
bot.name: Focused Breath Weapon

abilities: +2 status to all saves vs. magic

creature.name: Mengkare
creature.description: Male great wyrm gold dragon (Pathfinder Bestiary 124)

spells.name: dispel magic
notes: this spell has been cast already

spells.name: contingency
notes: this spell has been cast already

entries: 90 feet, {@dc 43}
mid.name: Frightful Presence

entries: Mengkare gains 2 reactions at the start of his turn each round.
mid.name: Extra Reaction

entries: Jaws only.
mid.name: Attack of Opportunity

mid.trigger: Mengkare fails a saving throw against a spell.
entries: {@spell Dispel magic} (7th level) attempts to counteract the triggering spell.
mid.name: Contingency

mid.trigger: The gold dragon fails a saving throw.
entries: The dragon improves its result by one degree of success, turning a failure into a success or a critical failure into a normal failure. The dragon can't use this ability again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
mid.name: Golden Luck

entries: The gold dragon breathes in one of two ways. The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.

items.name: Flame
entries: The dragon breathes a blast of flame in a 80-foot cone that deals {@damage 24d6} fire damage ({@dc 46} basic Reflex save).

items.name: Weakening Gas
entries: The dragon breathes a blast of weakening gas. Each creature within a 80-foot cone must succeed at a {@dc 46} Fortitude save or become {@condition enfeebled 4} for 1 minute (or {@condition enfeebled 5} on a critical failure).

bot.name: Breath Weapon

entries: Mengkare assumes a Medium humanoid form, posing as the human wizard Lamond Breachton.
bot.name: Change Shape

entries: The gold dragon makes two claw {@action Strike||Strikes} and one horns {@action Strike} in any order.
bot.name: Draconic Frenzy

entries: When the gold dragon scores a critical hit with a {@action Strike}, it recharges Breath Weapon.
bot.name: Draconic Momentum

entries: When Mengkare uses Breath Weapon, he can expel an explosive orb of flame instead of a cone. When he does, he fires the orb at the corner of a square within 60 feet.
The orb immediately detonates and deals {@damage 24d6} fire damage ({@dc 48} basic Reflex save) to all creatures within a 30-foot burst.
Creatures that critically fail their save catch on fire and take {@damage 4d6} {@condition persistent damage||persistent fire damage}.
bot.name: Explosive Breath

abilities: +2 status to all saves vs. magic

entries: A Promise guard always has their shield raised as if they had used the {@action Raise a Shield} action, as long as they meet that action's requirements.
mid.name: Promise Guard Stance

entries: A Promise guard can use their {@ability Shield Block} reaction to prevent damage to an adjacent ally.
mid.name: Shield Warden

entries: A Promise guard can use Attack of Opportunity when a creature within their reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to its normal trigger. They can disrupt triggering concentrate actions, and they disrupt actions on any hit, not just a critical hit.
mid.name: Attack of Opportunity

entries: The Promise guard makes a {@action Strike} with their longsword, then attempts to push the target back. If the {@action Strike} hits, the target is {@condition flat-footed} until the start of the guard's next turn, and the guard can automatically {@action Shove} the target, with the same benefits as the {@action Shove} action (including the critical success effect if the {@action Strike} was a critical hit). If the guard moves to follow the target, this movement doesn't trigger reactions. In addition, if the target has to stop moving because it would hit an object, it takes damage equal to the guard's Strength modifier.
bot.name: Shield Shove

entries: The Promise guard {@action Stride||Strides} up to double their Speed. If the guard ends their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee {@action Strike} against that enemy.
bot.name: Sudden Charge

entries: Rinnarv can use {@action Attack of Opportunity} when a creature within his reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to its normal trigger.
He can disrupt triggering concentrate actions, and he disrupts actions on any hit, not just a critical hit.
mid.name: Attack of Opportunity

entries: When Rinnarv casts one of his bloodline spells or a spell from his list of granted spells, he creates an aura that protects himself or one of the targets of the spell. The aura grants a +1 status bonus to saving throws for 1 round.
bot.name: Blood Magic

bot.trigger: Rinnarv begins to {@action Cast a Spell} that targets at least 1 creature
entries: Rinnarv channels his spell through his blade. He makes a {@action Strike} with his blade against a target within reach. If the {@action Strike} is successful, the target is automatically subject to the spell. If the spell required an attack roll, the target is hit. If the spell required a saving throw, the target takes a –4 status penalty to its saving throw instead. If the spell could target multiple creatures, it targets only the creature Rinnarv hit with his {@action Strike}.
bot.name: Spell Strike

entries: Tarrasque is immune to cones, lines, rays, and {@spell magic missile} spells. These effects bounce harmlessly off its scales.
mid.name: Carapace

entries: 300 feet, {@dc 39}
mid.name: Frightful Presence

entries: Tarrasque recovers from the {@condition slowed} and {@condition stunned} conditions at the end of its turn. It's also immune to penalties to its Speeds, and it ignores {@quickref difficult terrain||3|terrain} and {@quickref greater difficult terrain||3|terrain}.
mid.name: Inexorable

entries: Tarrasque gains 3 reactions each round. It can still use only one reaction per trigger.
mid.name: Reactive

entries: The effect is redirected back at its source.
mid.name: Reflect

entries: Tarrasque makes a jaws {@action Strike}, two claw {@action Strike||Strikes}, two horn {@action Strike||Strikes}, and one tail {@action Strike} in any order.
bot.name: Destructive Frenzy

bot.trigger: Tarrasque {@ability Grab||Grabs} a creature with its jaws
entries: Tarrasque uses {@ability Swallow Whole}.
bot.name: Fast Swallow

entries: Tarrasque flings spines in a 120-foot cone, dealing {@damage 3d10+20} piercing damage to each creature in the area ({@dc 53} basic Reflex save)
Tarrasque can't use Spine Volley again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Spine Volley

entries: Huge, {@damage 10d6+12} bludgeoning plus {@damage 10d6} acid, Rupture 50
bot.name: Swallow Whole

entries: Huge or smaller, claw, {@dc 49}. When Tarrasque Tramples, it can {@action Stride} up to triple its Speed.
bot.name: Trample

abilities: +2 status to all saves vs. {@trait magical||magic}

spells.name: plane shift
notes: to and from the vazgorlu's demiplane only

mid.trigger: A creature targets the vazgorlu with a {@action Strike}
entries: The vazgorlu chooses a different creature within 60 feet and attempts to swap places with that creature using {@spell dimension door} in the instant before the {@action Strike}. The target must attempt a {@dc 39} Will save.

entries.Critical Success: The target resists the teleportation, and the vazgorlu can't use Hostile Juxtaposition for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
entries.Failure: The target and the vazgorlu instantly swap places, and the triggering {@action Strike} is resolved against the target instead.
entries.Critical Failure: As failure, but the target is transported to the vazgorlu's demiplane after resolving the triggering {@action Strike} against it.

mid.name: Hostile Juxtaposition

entries: A creature hit by a vazgorlu's web {@action Strike} is {@condition immobilized} and stuck to the nearest surface until it {@action Escape||Escapes} ({@dc 42}). As long as it remains {@condition immobilized} by the web, the web attempts to counteract any effect that would move the webbed creature to another plane, with a counteract level of 10 and using the vazgorlu's {@skill Arcana} skill to attempt the counteract check.
bot.name: Dimensional Tether

entries: A vazgorlu maintains a 30-foot-diameter demiplane in the Astral Plane. Gravity in this demiplane pulls out from the center, so that creatures can walk upon the inner surface. A vazgorlu's demiplane lair lacks a built-in point of exit, and if the vazgorlu fails to visit the demiplane during a 24-hour period, the demiplane collapses—all objects and creatures within are then returned to their original locations in the multiverse before they entered the demiplane. A vazgorlu can create a replacement demiplane lair with 24 hours of concentration.
bot.name: Demiplane Lair

entries: A vazgorlu can spend 10 minutes in contact with a magical portal to redirect it, causing the portal to instead lead to its demiplane lair. To do so, the vazgorlu must succeed at a {@skill Lore||Portal Lore} check (the DC is either equal to the caster's spell DC for a portal created by a spell, or set by the portal's level, as listed on {@table dcs by level||Table 10–5 on page 503 of the Core Rulebook}; if the portal in question has no level listed, assume it's a 20th-level portal).
bot.name: Redirect Portal

entries: 300 feet, {@dc 39}
mid.name: Frightful Presence

entries: Xotani's light blindness is caused by only sunlight.
Reactive Xotani gains 3 reactions each round. It can still use only one reaction per trigger.
mid.name: Light Blindness

entries: Xotani gains 3 reactions each round. It can still use only one reaction per trigger.
mid.name: Reactive

entries: Xotani's wound erupts with magma in a 30-foot cone, dealing {@damage 6d8} fire damage and {@damage 6d8} {@condition persistent damage||persistent fire damage} ({@dc 42} basic Reflex save).
mid.name: Firebleed

entries: Xotani makes three lava bomb {@action Strike||Strikes}. These {@action Strike||Strikes} can be made against the same creature or different creatures, as long as all targets are within 40 feet of each other.
bot.name: Bomb Barrage

entries: Xotani breathes a blast of flame that deals {@damage 18d6} fire damage plus {@damage 4d6} {@condition persistent damage||persistent fire damage} to all creatures in a 70-foot cone ({@dc 42} basic Reflex save). It can't use Breath Weapon again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Breath Weapon

entries: Huge, {@damage 8d6+8} bludgeoning plus {@damage 12d6} fire, Rupture 35
bot.name: Swallow Whole

entries: Huge or smaller, claw, {@dc 42}. When Xotani Tramples, it can {@action Stride} up to triple its Speed.
bot.name: Trample
